page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: Fawkham boasts two leisure centres. "Fredericks" situated next to Brands Hatch Place owned & run by the hotel's owners.It offers squash,sauna,solarium spa,snooker,tennis,badminton,swimming, gym,creche & bar.50% of the l000 mem- bers are "family membership" drawn from locally,London & Essex.A large casual staff & l2 permanent staff are employed "Gay Dawn" farm originates through the forming of a boys football club by Mr.R.Billings.The original changing rooms being extended to form the lei- sure complex open to the public.It offers a private football pitch,weight training & solarium,jacuzzi,restaurant & sauna,indoor astro turf pitch where badminton,hockey & football can be played. Two outdoor pitches (one flood- lit) complete the complex.
